title: Shampoo Green Apple and Ginger 8 Ounces
description: Award winning Desert Essence Organics Green Apple & Ginger Thickening & Volumizing Shampoo is a gentle but effective cleansing system based on sugar and coconut oil. Organic extracts and oils provide moisture, minerals, and vitamins that hair needs to grow stronger. Upon use, hair is softer, shinier, and more manageable.Sugar and Coconut Oil Cleansers: Gently lift and remove everyday environmental pollutants from hair.Organic Jojoba Oil, Organic Ginger Extract, and Ginger Spice: A proprietary blend of ingredients that acts on the scalp to leave the skin feeling moisturized and revitalized.Organic Kelp and Nettle Extracts: Provide iron, calcium, potassium, and other vitamins and minerals that absorb into and help strengthen each hair strand.

title: NeutrogenaClear Pore Oil Eliminating Astringent, 8 Ounce
description: Clear Pore OilEliminating Astringent is specifically formulated to effectively treat acne and help prevent future pimples and blackheads. This maximum strength formula contains salicylic acid, an acnefighting ingredient recommended by dermatologists. It penetrates deep into pores to help remove dirt, oil and makeup that can clog pores and cause breakouts. It also instantly eliminates and controls excess surface oil. Gentle enough to use morning, afternoon and night, it won't overdry or irritate skin.

title: Neutrogena Body Clear Body Wash for Clean, Clear Skin, 8.5 Ounce
description: Neutrogena body clear body wash is a refreshing, cleanrinsing body wash that helps fight breakouts on your back, chest and shoulders. This effective, yet gentle formula contains a proven acnefighting ingredient that treats and helps prevent breakouts without overdrying and irritating your skin. The foaming lather rinses completely without pore clogging residue, leaving your skin feeling clean. Questions or comments? Call 18005824048 (USA only) or www.Neutrogena.com.

title: Neutrogena Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes, Refill Pack, 25 Count
description: #1 Dermatologist Recommended Makeup Remover Towelette*Easy Makeup Removal for Fresh, Clean SkinClinically proven to remove 99.3 percent of your most stubborn makeup, even waterproof mascara. It can take two competitive wipes to do what one Neutrogena Towelette can do.With one step, Neutrogena makeup removers leave skin thoroughly clean with no heavy residue, so there's no need to rinse.Neutrogena Makeup Remover TowelettesAt a Glance:Gentle enough to use around sensitive eye area, even for contact lens wearersUltra soft pre-moistened clothsOphthalmologist testedDermatologist testedAllergy testedAlcohol freePatented Formula is as Gentle as Water to the EyesThese gentle, ultra soft cloths contain superior cleansing technology so effective it removes even waterproof mascara. And they are gentle enough to use around the sensitive eye area, even for contact lens wearers. Make your skin make-up free the easy way.How to UseGently wipe your face with a towelette, removing dirt and all traces of face and eye make-up. There is no need to rinse. Dispose of the towelette in a trash receptacle (do not flush).What's in the BoxNeutrogena Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes Refill Pack (25 Pre-Moistened Towelettes).* Based on a survey performed in June 2011 by GfK Healthcare, an international independent market research agency, using a representative sample of 400 board-certified dermatologists.     Explore Neutrogena's Makeup Remover Options:Neutrogena Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes with Vanity Tub, 25-CountNeutrogena Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes Night Calming, 25-CountRemove all traces of makeup while enjoying a unique calming fragrance that helps you unwind and prepares you for a good night's sleep.Neutrogena Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes Refill Pack, 25-CountEffectively dissolve all traces of dirt, oil, and makeup--even waterproof mascara--for clean, fresh skin in one easy step.Neutrogena Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes Deep Clean, 25-CountUltra-soft, pre-moistened wipes that effectively and gently sweep away makeup, dirt, and oil for clear, fresh skin.Neutrogena Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes Refill Pack, 7-CountEffectively dissolve all traces of dirt, oil, and makeup--even waterproof mascara--for clean, fresh skin in one easy step.Neutrogena Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes Hydrating, 25-CountLeaves skin feeling soft and conditioned with a blend of replenishing hydrators and skin-soothing cucumber and aloe extracts.Trademark Information:Neutrogena®Neutrogena Fresh Foaming Cleanser®Neutrogena Deep Clean®

title: Garnier Moisture Rescue Refreshing Gel-Cream, Grape Water Extract, Vitamin E,  1.70-Fluid Ounce
description: Through collaboration with dermatologists and nutritionists, garnier has developed nutritioniste with "skin-nutrients", targeted to help your skin stay healthy looking and beautiful, day after day. Ingredient complexes developed exclusively by garnier to work on skin's outer layer.garnier nutritioniste(r) moisture rescue refreshing gel-cream locks in moisture for 24 hours, blocks out dryness. A light, oil free, gel-cream texture penetrates deeply into skin's upper layers so that skin looks and feels soft and smooth. Garnier nutritioniste(r) moisture rescue refreshing gel-cream is dermatologist tested for safety; non comedogenic - won't clog pores; gentle to skin; allergy tested; non-greasy.how is it different? Garnier nutritioniste moisture rescue refreshing gel-cream locks in moisture and blocks out dryness using a formula with a unique combination of pure antioxidant fruit water extracts and skin conditioning. Its ultra-lightweight, oil-free, refreshing gel-cream formula instantly penetrates for long-lasting moisture and boosts skin's defenses as it holds moisture for 24 hours. "skin-nutrient" facts - moisture rescue with: grape water extract: antioxidant power defends skin from external aggressors; vitamin e: soothes and conditions skin. Results - instantly: skin looks and feels supple and smooth. In 1 hour skin's moisture barrier is strengthened to prevent dryness. Ingredient complexes developed exclusively by garnier to work on skin's outer layer.

title: Garnier Fructis Style Anti-Humidity Hairspray UV Color Shield Ultra Strong Hold, 8.25 Ounce
description: With UV filter and bamboo extract. Keeps color radiant and shiny. Provides bounce-back hold. 24-hour hold in 90% humidity. Garnier fructis style hairspray collection is our first ever hairspray with bamboo extract and anti-humidity protection for 24-hour, bounce-back hold and natural, healthy-looking movement - even in 90% humidity. Selected for its strength, suppleness and resilience, bamboo bends but never breaks. This formula keeps you in control of your style with frizz control and bounce-back hold that lasts all day. This color-protecting hairspray with a UV filter keeps your color radiant and shiny and gives you an ultra strong hold over any style, even with moisture in the air for all day, everyday. Create your style. UV color shield hairspray styles use any Garnier fructis style product before setting your style and helping to protect your color's radiance with UV color shield hairspray. Spray on dry hair to finish any style. Layer where it's needed most for added hold. Made in Canada.
